headline: Aon and KNIAZHA VIENNA INSURANCE GROUP announce new $25M war-risk insurance facility with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, and KNIAZHA VIENNA INSURANCE GROUP ("KNIAZHA VIG") today announced a new $25M reinsurance facility agreement with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC).

content.title: Aon and KNIAZHA VIENNA INSURANCE GROUP announce new $25M war-risk insurance facility with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation
content.summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, and KNIAZHA VIENNA INSURANCE GROUP ("KNIAZHA VIG") today announced a new $25M reinsurance facility agreement with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC).

thumbnail.caption: Aon plc (NYSE: AON) exists to shape decisions for the better — to protect and enrich the lives of people around the world. Through actionable analytic insight, globally integrated Risk Capital and Human Capital expertise, and locally relevant solutions, our colleagues in over 120 countries provide our clients with the clarity and confidence to make better risk and people decisions that protect and grow their businesses. Follow Aon on LinkedIn, X, Facebook and Instagram. Stay up-to-date by visiting Aon’s newsroom and sign up for news alerts here.

headline: Insurance broker stocks tumble as OpenAI approves first AI insurance app
summary: Investing.com -- Major insurance broker stocks plummeted Monday amid investor concerns that artificial intelligence could disrupt traditional insurance distribution channels. The selloff followed reports from Reinsurance News and others that OpenAI approved the first AI insurance app on ChatGPT, built by Spanish digital insurer Tuio.

content.title: Insurance broker stocks tumble as OpenAI approves first AI insurance app
